definition: using (or as if using) mechanisms or tools or devices
details:
adjective
- using (or as if using) mechanisms or tools or devices
= example: using (or as if using) mechanisms or tools or devices
- relating to or governed by or in accordance with mechanics
= example: relating to or governed by or in accordance with mechanics
- relating to or concerned with machinery or tools
= example: relating to or concerned with machinery or tools
= synonyms: mechanically skillful
